entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
